# Abdal Net Py


## Made For



Powerful security network package for hackers and all security experts



**Requires Lib**
> hurry.filesize - speedtest


**Requires python**
> Python >= 3.9



Features

- test internet speed
- calculate internet speed with unit
- calculate byte to other unit

**How To install**

```py
pip install abdal-net-py
```

**How To use**

```py
import abdal_net_py
```
